expectations.text: An AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The file contains a section describing the project's directory structure (src/api, src/workers, src/shared)
expectations.evidence: Project Structure section with tree diagram showing all three directories

expectations.text: The file includes build and test commands (e.g., tsc, vitest or the npm script equivalents)
expectations.evidence: Build and Run, Testing, Linting sections all include commands

expectations.text: The file mentions the key technologies: TypeScript, Express, Prisma, Redis, BullMQ
expectations.evidence: Tech Stack section lists all five plus Zod, Vitest, Biome

expectations.text: The file mentions database migration or seeding commands (prisma migrate, seed)
expectations.evidence: Database section includes db:migrate, db:seed, db:studio

expectations.text: The file does not contain generic filler like 'run npm install to install dependencies'
expectations.evidence: Line 42: '# Install dependencies\nnpm install' â€” this is generic filler that every developer already knows
